name: The Althorpe Dining Table
description: A dining table that oozes contemporary sophistication, the Althorpe is distinguished by its sleek curves and angles to complete a stylish dining room. DAVIDSON is committed to providing a bespoke service and like all our tables, this stylish table is available in any of the luxury finishes from our range. The sleek top and slimline pedestals give the Althorpe a more lightweight feel compared to some of the other designs in the collection. *Please note that the 4 meter variation will require 3 pedestals.
